basic.blooming: Flowering period February-March, fruiting period October-November
basic.color: Leaf color dark green , fruit color red

maintenance.soil: Soil with loose texture or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Like sunshine, slight shade tolerance, avoid strong direct light
maintenance.watering: Resistant to drought, water thoroughly when soil is dry, avoid saturated water
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply 1-2 times monthly
maintenance.pruning: Pruning accordingly for any favorate tree shapes
